episodes.title: Unaired Pilot
episodes.description: Invalided home from the war in Afghanistan, Dr. John Watson becomes roommates with the world's only "consulting detective," Sherlock Holmes. Within a day their friendship is forged and several murders are solved.

episodes.title: A Study in Pink
episodes.description: War vet Dr. John Watson returns to London in need of a place to stay. He meets Sherlock Holmes, a consulting detective, and the two soon find themselves digging into a string of serial "suicides."

episodes.title: The Blind Banker
episodes.description: Mysterious symbols and murders are showing up all over London, leading Sherlock and John to a secret Chinese crime syndicate called Black Lotus.

episodes.title: The Great Game
episodes.description: Mycroft needs Sherlock's help, but a remorseless criminal mastermind puts Sherlock on a distracting crime-solving spree via a series of hostage human bombs through which he speaks.

episodes.title: A Scandal in Belgravia
episodes.description: Sherlock must confiscate something of importance from a mysterious woman named Irene Adler.

episodes.title: The Hounds of Baskerville
episodes.description: Sherlock and John investigate the ghosts of a young man who has been seeing monstrous hounds out in the woods where his father died.

episodes.title: The Reichenbach Fall
episodes.description: Jim Moriarty hatches a mad scheme to turn the whole city against Sherlock.

episodes.title: Many Happy Returns
episodes.description: John and Lestrade try to move on with their lives after Sherlock's apparent death. However, Anderson believes he is still alive.

episodes.title: The Empty Hearse
episodes.description: Mycroft calls Sherlock back to London to investigate an underground terrorist organization.

episodes.title: The Sign of Three
episodes.description: Sherlock tries to give the perfect best man speech at John's wedding when he suddenly realizes a murder is about to take place.

episodes.title: His Last Vow
episodes.description: Sherlock goes up against Charles Augustus Magnussen, media tycoon and a notorious blackmailer.

episodes.title: The Abominable Bride
episodes.description: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson find themselves in 1890s London in this Christmas special.

episodes.title: The Six Thatchers
episodes.description: Sherlock takes on the case of finding out who is going around and smashing six unique head statues of late Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher.

episodes.title: The Lying Detective
episodes.description: Sherlock goes up against the powerful and seemingly unassailable Culverton Smith - a man with a very dark secret indeed.

episodes.title: The Final Problem
episodes.description: A dark secret in the Holmes family rears its head with a vengeance, putting Sherlock and friends through a series of sick, manipulative psychological and potentially fatal games.
